title: KEOMUD Women Summer Pleated Maxi Dress Casual Short Sleeve Crewneck Flowy Swing Long Dress with Pockets
description: Fabric: Pleated maxi dress is made of 75% polyester and 25% spandex fabric, not see through, a-line pleated long dress is comfortable enough to wear all day, swing maxi dress is suitable for summer, spring, fall

Features: Casual swing long dress for summer fashion, button down closure easy to dress up and down, short sleeve pleated long dress, solid color pleated dress, side pockets are easy to carry items, loose pleated dress is suitable for most people

Occasions: Flowy pleated maxi dress is suitable for vocations, holidays, wedding, travel, beach, walking, shopping, travel, club, party, cocktail, night out, outdoor, street, and loose pleated dress can be a maternity dress

Styles: Summer pleated dress is elegant and fancy, easy to pair with summer and spring outfits, matching with heels and jewelry for an evening out, or flats, you can also use waist belt to add additional fashion, showing off your curves and highlighting the body proportion nicely
Cares: Solid color long pleated dress is recommended machine washing with a laundry bag in low temperature, do not bleach,and ironing on low temperature
